channel.title: Reference on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Reference on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Configuration
item.description: A list of available configuration settings in the site configuration file, hugo.toml, hugo.yaml, or hugo.json: [params] linkGoogle Fonts link Parameter Type Default Value Description google_fonts array N/A An array of Google fonts and sizes to load. e.g.google_fonts = [["Inter", "300, 400, 600, 700"],["Fira Code", "500, 700"]] This will load the Google Inter and Fira Code fonts in the specified sizes. sans_serif_font string System Font Set the Sans Serif font. e.g. "Inter" secondary_font string System Font Set the Secondary font.
